titles.title: To provide for the addition of the Truman Farm Home to the Harry S. Truman National Historic Site in the State of Missouri.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

committee.name: House Committee on Natural Resources
committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests and Public Lands

committee.name: House Committee on Natural Resources
committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests and Public Lands

action.text: Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 22 - 17.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 103-399.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 223.

action.text: Mr. Vento asked unanimous consent to discharge the Committee of the Whole House on the state of the Union and consider.
Considered by unanimous consent. (consideration: CR 11/22/93 H10918-10921)
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate, read twice.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committee.name: House Natural Resources
committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands

bill.summary: 11/23/1993--Passed House amended. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire the Truman Farm Home in Grandview, Jackson County, Missouri, to add to the Harry S. Truman National Historic Site. Directs the Secretary to provide appropriate political subdivisions of Missouri with technical and planning assistance for the development and implementation of plans, programs, regulations, or other means for minimizing the adverse effects on the Truman Farm House of the development and use of adjacent lands.
